mapper.select: SELECT c.* FROM hana_card c JOIN hana_account a ON c.accNumber = a.accNumber JOIN customer_hana cu ON a.identityNumber = cu.identityNumber WHERE cu.identityNumber = #{identityNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payCard (cardNumber, identityNumber, accNumber, cardName, validityPeriod, cardStatus, cvc, joinDate, cardCode, cardTypeCode, limit) VALUES (#{cardNumber}, #{identityNumber}, #{accNumber}, #{cardName}, #{validityPeriod}, #{cardStatus}, #{cvc}, SYSDATE, #{cardCode}, #{cardTypeCode}, #{limit})
